name: Unfair Coloring Competition
description:
Sometimes life gives you a brush so make lemonade or birds or something. This is a serious competition to see who is the best bird colorer in the flock. You gain points by coloring the black shape and lose points for coloring outside of it.

Controls

Use the mouse to move and hold left click to paint.

Credits

Mostly me, but art created by my gf. Her site.

Source Code

https://github.com/hymm/unfair_advantage_coloring

Note: Leaderboard maxes at 1000 entries and may take awhile to load.
